The resolution under which the Committee was appointed, orders ἲ( the prepara- tion of a critical standard edition of the Heidelberg Catechism in the original Ger- man, and Latin, together with a revised English translation, and an historical intro- duction, to be published in superior style as a centennial edition, in 1863.” Agree— ably to these instructions, we publish a comprehensive historical and theological Introduction, and a critical edition of the Catechism in four texts: Old German, Latin, Modern German, and English, printed in parallel columns.
